text: Mia Malkova (born July 1, 1992), formerly known as Madison Swan, is an American pornographic actress. She began her career in 2012 and has since appeared in around 130 adult movies. She has also been nominated for seven AVN Awards, winning two. Malkova was born in Palm Springs, California. She has been married to British pornographic actor Danny Mountain since July 20, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Mia Malkova at the Internet Adult Film Database * Mia Malkova at the Adult Film Database Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Riverside County, California Category:American pornographic actors Category:People from Palm Springs, California Category:AVN Award winners
title: Mia Malkova
